text: “Iwowo ndi omwe adawadalitsa Allah, mwa aneneri mu ana a Adam, ndi (m’mbumba ya) amene tidawatenga pamodzi ndi Nuh (m’chombo), ndi m’mbumba ya Ibrahim ndi Israyeli, ndi amene tidawaongola ndi kuwasankha. Ndipo zikawerengedwa kwa iwo Ayah za (Allah) Mwini chifundo chambiri, amagwa ndi kulambira uku akulira
